name: Strange Observer
description:
You are a young hacker who is connected to IP cameras and monitors naked girls. It is necessary to build as soon as possible the line of connection to be connected, differently you will be comprehended by failure. The more you will crack IP cameras - the you will see more naked girls.

Click a mouse connections, manipulating and turning them. Create connections from your computer to the computer of the victim.
Watch naked girls.

Interesting graphics and excellent music.

Management of a mouse. Click elements - turn them. Make the uniform line between the hero and the camera.
